columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLM_SCRB_FIX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Store claim scrubber type of fix.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Add Procedure


Delete Procedure


Change Procedure


Add Modifier


Delete Modifier

columns.name: CLM_SCRB_ATFIX_YN
columns.description:
Store whether this was an auto fix.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: CLM_SCRB_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Store claim scrubber group information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CLM_SCRB_EACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Store what action was performed by Epic.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Action


Warning


Error
